attach.description: Attaches your container to a border

bottom.description: is on of the possible borders to attach the containers

custom.description: Is a menu item in the right click menu with user/package made custom items in it

lock.description: Locks the container. Which means it's not movable/resizable anymore and changes some other properties depending on the Lockstyle (like hiding the borders)

lockstyle.description: There are different modes/styles to choose which will be the lock behaviour of the container

standard.description: Is one of the Lockstyles. This Lockstyle is the standard setting, with a small margin on top to keep the right click menu usable

light.description: Is one of the Lockstyles. Can also be translated as simple. It is only hiding the min/restore labels the borders and margin stays intact

full.description: Is one of the Lockstyles. Can also be translated as complete as it's locking the container without any margin left for the right click menu.

border.description: is one of the Lockstyles which keeps the borders of the container visible.

top.description: is one of the possible border the container can be attached to

left.description: is one of the possible borders the container can be attached to

right.description: one of the borders the container can be attached to

load.description: Loads the previously settings of the container
